name: Squash Sauce
keywords: butternut squash, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons grapeseed or extra virgin olive oil
1 1/2 cups peeled and cubed butternut squash
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, warm oil over medium heat. Add squash and onion, and saute until onion is soft, 2 to 3 minutes. Add stock, bring to a simmer and cook until squash is soft, about 15 minutes. Season to taste with salt, pepper, sugar and raz al hanout.
